entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Témiscamingue
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Temiskaming Dam 5:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 2.2°C
Humidity: 30 %
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow or freezing rain. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or ice pellets changing to freezing rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
